speaker: Chen
title: Bring Anomaly Detector on-premise with containers support
description:
We've brought to you Azure Anomaly Detector as a hosted API service on the cloud (check our last episode "Introducing Azure Anomaly Detector" on the AI Show(https://channel9.msdn.com/Shows/AI-Show/Introducing-Azure-Anomaly-Detector)). In this episode, we're bringing the same service to your premises with containers.

By deploying the same API service close to your data in containers, now you don't have to worry about situations when you have to keep the data on-premises to follow regulation, or to deal with network latency, or just want to reuse the same application powered-by Anomaly Detector across both the cloud and on-premise.

Join Anomaly Detector Containers preview: https://aka.ms/adContainer
Check out the overview of the API service: https://aka.ms/AnomalyDetector
Create your first Anomaly Detector resource on Azure: https://aka.ms/adNew
Find the Azure Notebook demo: https://aka.ms/adNotebook (remember to uncheck "Public" when you clone your instances)
Join "Anomaly Detector Advisors" public community to connect with the product team and other members in the community: https://aka.ms/adAdvisorsJoin
